promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a young legendary horse fire-type wearing a white crystal headband. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystallineer, a young legendary horse fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: incinerate. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word horse or fire or the ability names. generatedDescription: Crystallineer, a young legendary pokemon. Lives in volcanoes, sparkling with fire. Adept at incinerating foes with its mysterious power.
